technology.title: Library Management System
technology.description: Build a digital library system with user authentication and book tracking

details.fullDescription: Develop a comprehensive library management system that handles book inventory, member registrations, and loan tracking. The system should include admin controls for librarians and a user portal for patrons to search and reserve books. Implement features like due date reminders, late fee calculations, and book recommendation algorithms.

steps.title: Project Setup
items: Set up React frontend with Vite

steps.title: Database Design
items: Create schemas for Books, Users, and Loans

technology.title: AI-Powered Chatbot
technology.description: Create a conversational chatbot using Python and NLP

details.fullDescription: Develop an intelligent chatbot capable of understanding natural language queries and providing context-aware responses. The chatbot should integrate with common messaging platforms and include features like sentiment analysis and conversation history.

technology.title: E-Commerce Platform
technology.description: Build an online store with payment processing

details.fullDescription: Create a complete e-commerce solution featuring product catalog, shopping cart, user accounts, and Stripe payment integration. Includes admin dashboard for inventory management and order processing.

health.title: Fitness Tracker App
health.description: Track workouts and nutrition with data visualization

details.fullDescription: Develop a cross-platform mobile application for tracking exercise routines, nutrition intake, and progress metrics with data visualization and social sharing features.

health.title: Telemedicine Platform
health.description: Secure video consultations for doctors and patients

details.fullDescription: Build a HIPAA-compliant telemedicine platform with video consultations, appointment scheduling, prescription management, and patient records system.

business.title: Inventory Management System
business.description: Track stock levels and generate reports

details.fullDescription: Develop a desktop application for small businesses to manage inventory, track sales, generate reports, and automate reordering processes.

business.title: Customer Relationship Manager
business.description: Manage client interactions and sales pipelines

details.fullDescription: Create a CRM tool for managing client interactions, sales pipelines, marketing campaigns, and customer support tickets with analytics dashboard.

education.title: E-Learning Platform
education.description: Course management with video lessons and quizzes

details.fullDescription: Build a comprehensive e-learning platform with course creation tools, video lessons, interactive quizzes, progress tracking, and certification system.
Develop a mobile flashcard application using spaced repetition algorithms to optimize learning and memorization of concepts across various subjects.
